title: Landfall
description: ER nurse and hospice worker Jared White is caught up in more than just high winds when a hurricane traps him with Deputy Fire Chief Mike Brown. The handsome firefighter has had Jared drooling every time he visits the ER, but as far as Jared knows, Mike is straight â€“ until a downed bridge strands them alone in an empty firehouse. Will their passionate encounter outlast the storm?
author: Lori Toland
